sentence: The facilities were excellent check in and out smooth and friendly and breakfast very good indeed
Reception good and friendly
It is ideally located close to the train station and other amenities making it an ideal place for a business meeting
Warm welcome at the reception very nice breakfasts convenient location 5 walk to the city center
Not as fresh and modern as looked in photos reception area is lovely
Thanks to Fanny in reception team made every thing nice to me my family with an one day upgrade made feel the real benefit of my membership plus he warm welcome and nice treatment
Nice hotel close to all facilities
Very friendly and helpful stafVery good facilities quality of outfitingVery good matresRom was a bit warm
My son loved the pin ball game at the lobby
The rooms and reception areas of the hotel are nice and clean
Had problems with the lifts and the stairs were closed off

Although the reception staff themselves were very welcoming the hotel is in an extremely sorry state our “ Executive ” room was very tired with the furniture stained and grubby and the heating AC operated with a mind of its own I could not control it at all
Entrance into the hotel is not visible from the road in Construction and no clear direction to go to the lobby and parking garage
We told the reception girl and she came up a couple of times but could nt open the window And said shed phone but then she did nt
Only one elevator and there was a problem with the keys
I made claim to reception and he told me that he will report to manager and email to me but no email I received so far
1 one of the two elevators was out of order for the length of our stay 4nights
Elevators not so perfect and was out of use for a half day difficult climbing up to 5th floor by stair
And the card reader in the lift did not always work to get access to the room floor
There was only one person at the reception we had to wait half an hour to make the checkout as the only receptionist was assisting other guests with their fidelity card
